metadata.feature_description: Analytics dashboard for blog content including post views, comments, and engagement

steps.expected: Successfully logged in with PersonaBar visible
steps.actual: Successfully logged in, PersonaBar visible with Dashboard menu

steps.action: Click on Dashboard menu to reveal submenu
steps.expected: Dashboard submenu shows Site Analytics and Community Analytics options
steps.actual: Dashboard submenu displayed correctly with both options visible

steps.action: Click on Community Analytics submenu item
steps.expected: Community Analytics panel opens showing analytics dashboard
steps.actual: Panel fails to load. JavaScript error: 'TypeError: utility.serializeCustomDate is not a function' at dashboardClass.init. The main content area remains blank.

issues: Critical JavaScript error prevents Community Analytics panel from loading
Error: TypeError: utility.serializeCustomDate is not a function
Error occurs in social-dashboard-combined-instance.js at line 1025
The utility.serializeCustomDate function is called but does not exist

steps.action: Navigate to Community Analytics > Blogs Tab
steps.expected: Blogs analytics tab opens with blog post statistics
steps.actual: Cannot test - Community Analytics panel fails to load due to JavaScript error

issues: Unable to test due to Community Analytics panel load failure

steps.action: Navigate to Community Analytics > Blogs Tab and view comment metrics
steps.expected: Comment engagement metrics visible in Blogs analytics
steps.actual: Cannot test - Community Analytics panel fails to load due to JavaScript error

issues: Unable to test due to Community Analytics panel load failure

steps.actual: Cannot test - Community Analytics panel fails to load due to JavaScript error

issues: Unable to test due to Community Analytics panel load failure

steps.expected: Popular blog posts list displays with view counts
steps.actual: Cannot test - Community Analytics panel fails to load due to JavaScript error

issues: Unable to test due to Community Analytics panel load failure

steps.action: Navigate to Community Analytics > Blogs Tab and verify metrics
steps.actual: Cannot test - Community Analytics panel fails to load due to JavaScript error

issues: Unable to test due to Community Analytics panel load failure

steps.action: Navigate to Community Analytics > Blogs Tab and use date range selector
steps.expected: Date range selector allows comparison of blog performance over time
steps.actual: Cannot test - Community Analytics panel fails to load due to JavaScript error

issues: Unable to test due to Community Analytics panel load failure

observations: Critical JavaScript error in Community Analytics module prevents all testing
Error: 'utility.serializeCustomDate is not a function' in social-dashboard-combined-instance.js:1025
The Community Analytics menu item is visible and clickable in the Dashboard submenu
When clicked, the panel content area remains blank due to the initialization error
This is a blocking bug that affects the entire Community Analytics feature, not just Blogs analytics
The code in Services/CommunityAnalyticsController.cs and Components/CommunityAnalyticsController.cs appears correct; the issue is in the JavaScript initialization
Site Analytics also shows a warning about Google Analytics not being configured, but loads partially
The serializeCustomDate function is called during dashboard initialization but is not defined in the utility object
